text: aur tumhen kyo hua hai ki tum allaah ke maarg mein kharch na karo, haalaanki aakaashon aur dharatee kee viraasat allaah hee ke lie hai? tumamen se jin logon ne vijay se poorv kharch kiya aur lade ve paraspar ek-doosare ke samaan nahin hai. ve to daraje mein unase badhakar hai jinhonne baad mein kharch kiya aur lade. yadyapi allaah ne pratyek se achchha vaada kiya hai. allaah usakee khabar rakhata hai, jo kuchh tum karate ho
